Name: Red Marauder
Ingredients: 10 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Cognac-laced fruity raspberry and cognac but not the sweetie you might expect - indeed it's surprisingly dry thanks to a splash of lime juice.
History: Originally created for Martell, four-year sponsors of England's Grand National Hunt horse race, this is named after the horse that won in 2001.
Nutrition: One serving of Red Marauder contains 162 calories
